select sales.u_id, location, distance, sales_state, u_profile_img, co_name, work_date, grade from ( select tbl_ft_sales.u_id, location, SQRT(pow(tbl_ft_sales.lat - #{lat}, 2) + pow(tbl_ft_sales.lng - ${lng}, 2)) as distance, sales_state, work_date from tbl_ft_sales where sales_state="1" and date(work_date) = date(now()) order by distance ) as sales
inner join tbl_ft_info as info on sales.u_id = info.u_id order by distance limit #{page},8
